author: "Justinian I, Emperor of the East, 483?-565"
title: "Institutionum juris civilis [Justiniani] libri quatuor, olim a Theophilo antecessore in graecum e latino... translati et nunc nuper in gratiam eorum quibus operam graecis literis dare non admodum vacat aut libet, e graeco in latinum per D. Jac. Curtium,.."
